function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain representation of population in CDRs","Impact":"Inaccurate risk assessment and contact tracing","Mitigation":"Incorporate multiple data sources for a more comprehensive demographic profile","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, machine learning algorithms","People":"Population not fully represented in CDRs","Owner":"Data scientists, public health officials"},{"Description":"Limited knowledge of network subscriber demographics and daily activities","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess infection risks for different groups","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted surveys and studies to gather demographic and activity data","Technologies":"Survey tools, data analytics platforms","People":"Network subscribers","Owner":"Public health researchers, telecommunication companies"},{"Description":"Uncertain accuracy of risk mapping approach","Impact":"Ineffective identification of areas with ongoing transmission","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional indicators and validation methods for improved accuracy","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, statistical modeling software","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
